content.theme: The boundary between dimensions is thin. You make it thinner.
content.design: Rift augments enhance magic use, manage toxicity, and provide unique utility through dimensional manipulation.

augments.name: Ambient Siphon
augments.effect: Recover 1 HP at end of each combat

augments.name: Toxicity Sense
augments.effect: Detect rift anomalies and ambient toxicity levels within 30m

augments.name: Rift Pulse
augments.effect: 1/combat: 1d6 magic damage to all adjacent. +1 Toxicity

augments.name: Magic Recycler
augments.effect: When you deal magic damage, heal 1 HP (1/round)

augments.name: Dimensional Anchor
augments.effect: Cannot be forcibly moved or teleported by enemies

augments.name: Rift Shield
augments.effect: 1/combat: absorb up to 6 damage into toxicity (1 tox per 2 dmg)

augments.name: Arcane Resonance
augments.effect: Magic weapon damage dice upgraded by 1 step

augments.name: Mana Burn
augments.effect: When you take magic damage, attacker gains +2 Toxicity

augments.name: Dimensional Conduit
augments.effect: 1/mission: open a small rift. Allies can step through to any location within 100m. +5 Toxicity to caster
